text: William Mark "Bill" Fagerbakke (born October 4, 1957) is an American actor and voice actor who is mostly known for his role as SpongeBob SquarePants' best friend Patrick Star in Nickelodeon's SpongeBob SquarePants franchise and as Michael "Dauber" Dybinski in Coach. In movies he is known for his role as Deputy Webb in the 2009 horror movie Halloween II. Fagerbakke was born in Fontana, California on October 4, 1957. He was educated at the University of Idaho. He was married to actress Catherine McClenahan in 1989. Together, they had two daughters, Hannah and Carson. They separated in September 2012. ==Filmography== * Perfect Strangers (1984) * Almost Partners (1987) * The Secret of My Success (1987) * Funny Farm (1988) * Coach (1989–1997) (TV Series) * Loose Cannons (1990) * 3×3 Eyes (1991) * Porco Rosso (1992) * Aaahh!!!
